meanings.definition: A line on a graph representing a constant pressure or temperature
meanings.sent1: The isochore on the graph showed the temperature remained the same.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use isochores to study how pressure changes affect the system.
meanings.sent3: The isochore on the chart seemed to be stuck at a particular point, refusing to budge.
meanings.sent4: The isochore acted like a steadfast guide, leading us through the maze of data.
meanings.sent5: The isochore was like a straight road in a city, always indicating the same temperature ahead.
